abstract: The minimum wage is set to rise in 21 states by New Year’s Day. Amazon Prime Now delivered candy to a blogger in 23 minutes. Nebraska and Oklahoma sue Colorado to stop marijuana legalization.
snippet: The minimum wage is set to rise in 21 states by New Year’s Day. Amazon Prime Now delivered candy to a blogger in 23 minutes. Nebraska and Oklahoma sue Colorado to stop marijuana legalization.
lead_paragraph: What’s affecting me, my clients and other small-business owners today.

headline.main: Today in Small Business: Fracking and Gambling
